name: SnipSnap
description:
Syntax and Filetype plugin for SnipSnap Wiki [1].

Use together with Editus Externus [2] and FireFox [3] for easy editing of SnipSnap Wiki pages.

Reports errors to: http://code.google.com/p/vim-scripts/issues/list
Discuss improvements on: http://groups.google.com/group/vim_scripts

[1] http://www.snipsnap.org/space/start
[2] http://martin.krischik.com/index.php/Main/EditusExternus.
[3] http://www.mozilla.com/firefox
